mapper.select: SELECT cli.cli_nm as CLI_NM, eq.eqp_code as EQP_CODE, eq.eqp_name as EQP_NAME, eq.eqp_comm as EQP_COMM, eq.eqp_price as EQP_PRICE, eq.eqp_sts as EQP_STS, TO_CHAR(eq.eqp_purchase_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EQP_PURCHASE_DATE, TO_CHAR(eq.eqp_installation_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EQP_INSTALLATION_DATE, prc.prc_nm as PRC_NM FROM equipment eq left JOIN client cli ON eq.cli_id = cli.cli_id left JOIN process prc ON eq.prc_id = prc.prc_id ORDER BY eq.eqp_id asc OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT prc.prc_id as PRC_ID, prc.prc_nm as PRC_NM FROM process prc ORDER BY prc.prc_id asc
SELECT cli.cli_id as CLI_ID, cli.cli_nm as CLI_NM FROM client cli WHERE cli.cli_type = 'client_cat_03' ORDER BY cli.cli_id asc
mapper.insert:

mapper.select: SELECT eqp.eqp_id as EQP_ID, eqp.eqp_code as EQP_CODE, eqp.eqp_name as EQP_NAME, eqp.eqp_comm as EQP_COMM, eqp.eqp_price as EQP_PRICE, eqp.eqp_sts as EQP_STS, TO_CHAR(eqp.eqp_purchase_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EQP_PURCHASE_DATE, TO_CHAR(eqp.eqp_installation_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EQP_INSTALLATION_DATE, prc.prc_nm as PRC_NM, cli.cli_nm as CLI_NM, cli.cli_id as CLI_ID, prc.prc_id as PRC_ID FROM equipment eqp left JOIN process prc ON eqp.prc_id = prc.prc_id left JOIN client cli ON eqp.cli_id = cli.cli_id WHERE eqp.eqp_code = #{eqp_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE equipment SET eqp_name = #{eqp_name}, eqp_comm = #{eqp_comm}, eqp_price = #{eqp_price}, eqp_sts = #{eqp_sts}, eqp_purchase_date = #{eqp_purchase_date}, eqp_installation_date = #{eqp_installation_date}, prc_id = #{prc_id}, cli_id = #{cli_id} WHERE eqp_code = #{eqp_code}
